sentences.en: Forgives me, is I is not very brave, the choice is a deserter.
sentences.cn: 我要排到多少啊?原谅我, 是我不够勇敢, 选择做个逃兵.

sentences.en: He was a deserter. Once he ran from the field of battle.
sentences.cn: 他是个逃兵. 有一次,他从战场上逃走了.

sentences.en: He was executed as a deserter.
OLD LIN --- In his thirties. A deserter.
sentences.cn: 老林 —— 男.三十多岁. 逃兵.

sentences.en: Peters had two deserters followed and shot.
sentences.cn: 彼得斯派人追赶并开枪打死了那两个逃兵。

sentences.en: They officially and personally regarded De Gaulle as a deserter.
sentences.cn: 他们官方和私人方面皆视戴高乐谨系一流亡者.

sentences.en: We leave are a military deserter again, waited for that again love revives.
sentences.cn: 我们都别再做个逃兵, 等待再一次爱情复兴.

sentences.en: What he looked like was a deserter!

words.tran_cn: 遗弃（desert的过去式和过去分词）
逃兵；背弃者；[劳经]擅离职守者；脱党者

trans.tran_cn: 背弃者，逃亡者，脱党者，逃兵
trans.tran_en: a soldier who leaves the army, navy etc without permission
